DOC.brief_summary: The investigator conduct single-blind , randomize control trial 60 patient subacute stroke . Patients randomly assign control group intervention group . The intervention group participate immersion VR train 3 week . The control group receive traditional rehabilitation train 3 week . Then , patient reevaluate determine change upper extremity function , cognitive function , cortical subcortical activation pattern , performance activity daily live baseline assessment .
DOC.brief_title: Immersive Virtual Reality Based Training Rehabilitation Subacute Stroke
DOC.criteria: 1. ischemic stroke first time 2. age 30 80 year old 3. first stroke within 2 month 4 . GCS score > 8 5. upperlimb function BrunnstromⅡ、Ⅲ 1. hemorrhage transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) 2. important organ heart , lung , liver , kidney function decline failure 3. previous history brain neurosurgery epilepsy 4. severe cognitive impairment aphasia , make participant unable understand instruction give investigator 5. claustrophobia body metal ( metal teeth , etc . ) suitable MRI scanning
